name: Pempelord: A souls journey
description:
Pempelord: A soul's journey, is a visual novel that follows your life in a world new to you. 

Through your interaction with others you will build your own path in life. You will be at some point able to explore vast regions of the world,  discover lore about different places and meet new people. Most importantly, find your place in all the events that will unfold.

As of right now the project is as fresh as can be. Through time new chapters and possibilities will be added. 

Please feel free to share any tips you can and report bugs you find. For now I'm a "one men army" and can't do everything effectively.

Thanks! :)
